籤詩版本二:
Karatun kasidu a faɗuwar rana, rera waƙoƙi a ƙarƙashin wata, yin barkwanci a kowane lokaci
Idan muka hadu, za mu ɓuya cikin wahala mu raira waƙa tare don rera Lianliluo, Lianli yana nufin itacen da ke ci gaba. Yana wakiltar jituwa tsakanin mata da miji. Luo Zhiwang. Yana nufin cewa ma'aurata suna manne da juna. Ko siliki da satin suna nufin tufafi masu launi.
詩意:
Wannan hexagram alama ce ta adana abubuwa da kuma canzawa a kowane lokaci.
Komai yana da kyau.
解曰: Kyau yana cikin gidan. Waƙar waƙa. Akwai farin ciki. Sa'a da rashin sa'a.
籤詩故事一:
◇Su Xiaomei yana cikin matsala
A daular Song, Su Xiaomei ita ce kanwar Su Dongpo, tana da ilimi da hazaka, a daren aurensu, Su Xiaomei ya rera wakoki da rubuta ma'aurata. An shirya tambayoyi uku masu wuyar gaske don gwada surukin, kuma da gangan ya sa ango Qin Shaoyou ya yi wa ango wahala.Da aka zo ga tambaya ta uku, Qin Shaoyou ya yi tunani sosai.
An yi sa'a, Su Dongpo ya taimaka masa a asirce kafin ya shiga dakin amarya.
Akwai wata waka da ke cewa:
Labari sun ce tun zamanin da, ƙanwar ta fi mijinta wayo;
Ango na Wahala Uku hakika abin ban mamaki ne, gida ne mai kyau wanda babu irinsa a duniya.
聖意: Sa'a ga gida, sa'a ga kansa, sa'a ga kasuwanci, sa'a ga aure, sa'a ga mata, tafiya gona, tsummoki na siliki, sa'a ga dabbobi, neman mutane, sa'a ga shari'a, sa'a don sa'a. hijira, sa'a ga dukiyar da aka rasa, sa'a ga rashin lafiya, sa'a ga rashin lafiya, sa'a ga kaburburan dutse
